keyword.description: The Finesse Glitch allows you to obtain an S rank in Finesse despite losing your combo in the level. To do it, you need to complete the level after you hit exit level in the menu. Example: http://www.twitch.tv/tropicallo_/c/3676622
The 4butt cancel (short for 4 button cancel) allows you to do heavy cancels without leaving the ground. To do it, you need to hit dash, light attack, heavy attack and jump on the same frame.
Spikejumping is done by using up your aircharge (doublejump/midair dash) and holding jump + down while landing on a 45 degree angled spike.
